comment._content: @iso and lotusmonger: At nearly 6'4" he was a giant among men at that time.  Historically, furniture was much smaller then as it now as the population was not as tall.  So uncomfortable... certainly.

comment._content: A very stately pose of this towering six foot, four inch statesman of the Civil War era....Abraham Lincoln. We will remember your memory forever, Father Abraham. Enter into the Kingdom.
